item.title: Triathlon gives BUCS Duathlon a ‘tri’
item.author: Amy Devila,
item.description: Sunrise came. The sun was finally shining, giving relief to a week of grim weather. It was BUCS duathlon. The biggest race in the duathlon calendar. A season finale. The challenge? A 2 mile run, followed by a 10 mile bike, and then another 2 mile run. Nice. With an air of excitement, the team …
